author: Rosie Perper
title: Passover foods are being sold for for 5 times the retail price as online sellers try to profit off of coronavirus shortages
description: As the Jewish holiday of Passover begins this week, shoppers have reported shortages of items in grocery stores and online. Business Insider discovered similar price-gouging by online retailers on Passover foods like matzah and Kosher for Passover cakes. Pric…
content: This week, Jewish people around the world are celebrating Passover, a major holiday that celebrates the exodus from Egypt. As part of the holiday, families usually gather together for a traditional meal service called a "seder" and eat special foods deemed st… [+2046 chars]
